thread.title: Venture beyond the valley floor in Napa
thread.title_full: Venture beyond the valley floor in Napa - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Esther Mobley
title: Venture beyond the valley floor in Napa
text:
Photo: Sarah Rice, Special To The Chronicle Winemaker Jim Duane punches down the grapes at Seavey Vineyard in St. Helena, Calif., on Monday, October 12, 2015. Winemaker Jim Duane punches down the grapes at Seavey Vineyard in...
If you’re a casual visitor to the Napa Valley — the kind of person who wants to just drive up, without a strict schedule and without over-reliance on your phone’s GPS — you’ll likely spend your whole visit on Highway 29 and Silverado Trail, the two main highways that run parallel, north to south, through the valley. Winemaker Jim Duane punches down the grapes at Seavey Vineyard in St. Helena, Calif., on Monday, October 12, 2015. Winemaker Jim Duane punches down the grapes at Seavey Vineyard in...
If you’re a casual visitor to the Napa Valley — the kind of person who wants to just drive up, without a strict schedule and without over-reliance on your phone’s GPS — you’ll likely spend your whole visit on Highway 29 and Silverado Trail, the two main highways that run parallel, north to south, through the valley.
